documentation.title: Array Indent
documentation.standard: The opening square bracket/parenthesis of a multi-line array must be indented at least to the same level of the start of the statement.

code.title: Valid: Opening square bracket/parenthesis token of a multi-line array indented at least to the same level as the start of the statement.
Invalid: Opening square bracket/parenthesis of a multi-line array not indented at least to the same level as the start of the statement.

documentation.standard: The elements of an array must be indented four spaces beyond the indentation level of the opening square bracket/parenthesis.

code.title: Valid: Elements of an array indented four spaces beyond the indentation level of the opening square bracket/parenthesis.
Invalid: Elements of an array not indented four spaces beyond the indentation level of the opening square bracket/parenthesis.

documentation.standard: There must be a newline before the array closing square bracket/parenthesis.

code.title: Valid: Newline before the array closing square bracket/parenthesis.
Invalid: No newline before the array closing square bracket/parenthesis.

documentation.standard: The closing square bracket/parenthesis must be indented four spaces less than the array elements.

code.title: Valid: Closing square bracket/parenthesis indented four spaces less than the array elements.
Invalid: Closing square bracket/parenthesis not indented four spaces less than the array elements.
